details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.18 Annotation - 7.18.1 General - Alt in form field
details.description: A form field whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box shall have a TU key present or all its Widget annotations shall have alternative descriptions (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure elements)

rule.description: A form field whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box shall have a TU key present or all its Widget annotations shall have alternative descriptions (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure elements)
rule.test: isOutsideCropBox == true || (F & 2) == 2 || (TU != null && TU != '') || (Alt != null && Alt != '')

error.message: A form field whose hidden flag is not set and whose rectangle is not outside the crop-box neither has TU key nor its Widget annotations have alternative descriptions (in the form of an Alt entry in the enclosing structure element)
